==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|むかし|むかし}}

===Etymology===
Reduplication of {{m|ja|昔|tr=mukashi||ancient times, a long time ago}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|むかし むかし|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|昔々}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|むかし むかし}}

# [[ancient]] times, a very long time ago
#: {{ja-usex|昔昔、遠いところに…|むかし むかし、 とおい ところ に…|a '''long time ago''' in a place far away...}}

====Usage notes====
When used to start a [[fairy tale]] or other [[story]], ''mukashi mukashi'' is often glossed as {{m|en|once upon a time}}.

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|大昔|おおむかし}}
